column1: Baby Barnaby's////If the Barnaby's next door is gastro/nirvana. . . this is breakfast valhallah! whether you're vegetariam or carnivore this is the place to come. Inside is snug and cozy and fills up fast outside is a lovely patio to sip coffee while waiting for your food--The waitstaff is friendly and the service is fast--The place is always busy and the food is always good! i've never gottena bad meal at any of the barnaby's!
